strapiPost.title: Loop-de-loop
strapiPost.content:
We know how much you all love the trails around here, even when you have to detour through the Baum-Walker Stadium parking lot.

  • Detour no more: Construction is finished on the Tsa La Gi trail in Fayetteville just south of Martin Luther King Jr Blvd, and a new 5-mile loop, nicknamed the ’So Fay Loop,’ is complete.
  • More improvements: Another project on the Tsa La Gi trail was approved earlier this year to move a portion of the trail next to were the U of A is building a 12-court tennis complex. The trail will be moved away from the busyness of the main road where restaurants reside, making it more safe. 

Read more about the trail updates HERE.
